description: A VS Code extension that integrates Claude AI as your coding assistant using the Agent SDK.
command.openChat.title: Open Chat
command.newSession.title: New Chat Session
command.cancelSession.title: Cancel Current Request
configuration.title: Damocles
configuration.permissionMode.default: Standard behavior - prompts for dangerous operations
configuration.model.description: Claude model to use (empty for default). Examples: claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929, claude-opus-4-20250514
configuration.maxBudgetUsd.description: Maximum budget in USD per session (null for unlimited)
configuration.maxThinkingTokens.descript: Maximum extended thinking tokens (null to disable extended thinking)
configuration.betasEnabled.description: Enabled beta features (e.g., 1M context window for 4.5)
configuration.enableFileCheckpointing.de: Enable file checkpointing for undo/rewind functionality
configuration.maxIndexedFiles.descriptio: Maximum number of files to index for @ mention autocomplete
configuration.sandbox.description: Sandbox settings for command execution isolation
configuration.sandbox.enabled.descriptio: Enable sandbox mode for Bash commands
configuration.sandbox.allowUnsandboxedCo: Allow commands that cannot be sandboxed
configuration.sandbox.networkAllowLocalB: Allow binding to local ports in sandbox
configuration.providerProfiles.descripti: Provider profiles with environment variables for different API providers
configuration.providerProfiles.name.desc: Unique name for the provider profile
configuration.providerProfiles.env.descr: Environment variables for this provider (e.g., ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL, ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN)
configuration.activeProviderProfile.desc: Currently active provider profile name (null to disable)
